itemDescription: English rugby union footballer and coach

wikipedia_page.main: Richard Blaze (born 19 April 1985 in Birmingham, England) is an English former rugby union player, who played Lock for Leicester Tigers.

response: In 2009/10 Slater provided cover for long-term injuries to England international locks Louis Deacon and Geoff Parling, whilst the retirements of Ben Kay and Richard Blaze allowed Slater to break through to the first team squad. Slater's consistent performances earned him Tigers' Player of the Month award in October 2010 and he went on to make over 30 appearances for the club in his first season.Ed Slater surprised by fine start at Leicester Tigers 17 November 2010 In the same season he helped Tigers top the leaderboard and make it to the Aviva Premiership final in the 2010-2011 season.
